name: UPGRADE (howyu.doinn)
description:
Game Story

When suddenly, star-spotted humans come to invade the earth and occupy the world’s land because they need human plant sources for food. That’s why over time the world will gradually deteriorate. until an opposing group arises So they combined their brains to create a rejuvenating machine. And then entrust the hero with good fighting skills to go out and reclaim and restore various areas of the world.

Game Overview

TPS, a game that players have to restore areas in each stage from alien invasion. Players will be given 315 guns and ammunition to play in each stage, with each stage having different score conditions for unlocking the next stage.

Game mechanics

Players must kill enemies and complete levels by placing regenerators in each stage's area for a limited amount of ammo.

CONTROL

W-forward A-left S-back D-right 

C-crouch X-dodge Esc-pause

Mouse1-shoot Mouse-aim

Ctrl-change cam
